Often the situation where I want to change download settings, such as the folder where the downloaded files are saved, is when I have just downloaded something, and it has gone into a wrong place. The contextually most relevant UI in that situation is the Downloads window (unless it has automatically closed). But it's not possible to access any download settings from that window. Instead the user must just know where those settings can be found.

I propose adding into the Downloads window (that lists current and past downloads) for example some sort of link to the download settings dialog.


Reproducible: Always
